website_summaries.verdict: A level 2 charger that is fast to set up and easy to use, with a companion app that’s a pleasure to use for scheduling and usage tracking.
pros: Nest compatible, and companion app accurately tracks real-time charging rate, cost, and other statistics
Installation is straightforward with mounting hardware included
cons: App doesn’t offer very much raw data for those who want more details
No power cord support for NEMA 14-50 outlets (recommended for NEMA 6-50)
Cord length may be too short to reach cars parked outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Charger works great but the plug-in version has a design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product is very good. The charging works great and the features are nice. You have to use their app, but it allows you to estimate your charging costs based on your provider and track your charging trends. The mounting design for the plug-in version is poorly designed. I attached a picture of the provided mounting layout. You're supposed to mount the charger above the plug, with the center of the charger anchored in a stud. You cannot put an outlet in a stud! This layout is impossible to achieve. I had to install a piece of backing plywood that was secured to the studs. I suggest that you skip the plug-in version and get the hardwired one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We ended up having an electrician install this. We chose the model that plugs in, instead of the hardwire. We had the outlet installed before the charger arrived and the length of the cord is incredibly short so make sure you have the charger first if you need to install the electrical outlet. Additionally, the charger must be mounted on studs which further limits the location of the outlet. We’ve had it several months with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P

customer_reviews.title: Good when it works which is only half the time.
customer_reviews.text: Our charger works only some of the time and we don’t know why? We plug in our car and the color on the unit changes to blue indicating it’s charging but we check in a few hours and we have added zero miles. We don’t have this problem when using other chargers (public or at work). It seems we need to reset our unit and keep checking to ensure it’s actually doing so which is very frustrating. Seems we have a faulty unit. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: C8992

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with the Charge Point system. I used it before for public charging and now that I have one in my home it's even better. I like having all the data in one app. I like that I can schedule my charge times to off peak electric hours. I really like everything about this system. I had a local electrician install the product and it seemed to be an easy process for them.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessJamieK01

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, good information on charge cost using the app.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and setup. Seriously this was easier than setting up my Alexa. Of course I was already using the ChargePoint App on my phone for using public charge stations so I’m sure that’s part of it. 3 screw lug bolts using the included template made it easy. Installing the charge cable was literally a 60 second install. Once powered up I used the app to get it registered and on my Wifi, after that I just plugged it into the car at it worked. I’ll update this review after 6 months but so far it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H. Blunck

customer_reviews.title: Great BEV Charger
customer_reviews.text: Ok, did my research and chose this one. I am not an expert but needed a level 2 charger for our BMW i3s. Had an electrician install a plug, pretty simple install. Charger came and I mounted to the wall and plugged it in, and it worked. Great app very easy to set up and use. Chose plug version as opposed to hardwired because who knows what the future will hold with chargers or our car.
customer_reviews.author: BeHappy

customer_reviews.title: Quick install and works well
customer_reviews.text: This charger was easy to install and setup. It is one of the more compact chargers on the market. The wi-fi connection and the ChargePoint app and website make it easy to monitor the charging process and your energy costs.
customer_reviews.author: MFD14534

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I moved into a brand new home. We are a little ways out from the city and our commuter cars are our only source of transportation. The Chargepoint for your home, is fast, safe and reliable. My fiancé installed it his self. However, I wouldn’t recommend that for a person that has no concept of wattage and where the location of the unit should be placed. There was one set back. There wasn’t an option for what type of plug in prong that was sent. He had to reinstal a 3 prong plug. Over all a great a wise discussion on our behalf.
customer_reviews.author: Iceola Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great electric car charger.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in the garage to use with our 2017 Honda Clarity. Works great! My husband likes the option that he can set a timer for how long it charges the car. Easy how to instructions, installed in one afternoon. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Dead after charging less than 10 times
customer_reviews.text: The unit no longer works. It has power but the light is red. Tech support indicates this is rare but a defect. I want a full refund, not a replacemen/refurbished unit. Amazon please help!!
customer_reviews.author: Cusemax

customer_reviews.title: Wifi connection issue.
customer_reviews.text: The initial setup was easy. But at times, the wifi connection on the charger some time goes off and on, even my wifi can reach beyond my garage. Nothing is blocking the wifi signal.
customer_reviews.author: Trung Tran

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic charger with lots of cool WIFI features
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic charger with lots of cool WIFI features, including viewing your monthly charging/electrical expenses and charging habits. It's easy to install and does not take up a lot of room on the wall. It's solidly built and will likely last years to come.
customer_reviews.author: W. Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: expensive but works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: So the app is great, and works with all charging stations I have used. 6.6 kwh charge as designed (making a leaf charge from 0-100 in ~3 hours) chose 240 plug for possible expansion and other use in the garage (welding) it is expensive but does the job well
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Inge

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 11 months!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit to use its WiFi features to monitor charging. After a few months it disconnected from WiFi. Now it refuses to reconnect, it won’t reset through the app, and there’s no other way to reset! Save your money and buy a non-WiFi dumb charger. Update: After 11 months charger stopped working entirely (yellow flashing light). Custom service is slow to help, don't seem to care that this is the way I fuel my car.
customer_reviews.author: Werner

customer_reviews.title: this charger works well, but is not compatable with GFCI circuit breaker
customer_reviews.text: unfortunatly when i installed anew 240 volt/40 amp circuit, our Howard county code requires GFCI circuit breaker, which is not compatible with ths car charger, so would like to return this charger, and get one compatible with GFCI circuit breaker, COULD YOU TELL ME HOW I CAN DO IT WITH AMAZON?
customer_reviews.author: mohammed gheba

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had a problem since I got it! Super happy since now I can plug in overnight at off-peak hrs and be at a full charge when I wake up. Takes only about 3 hrs from low battery! And it reminds me to plug in thru the chargepoint app!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my Chevy Bolt. Easy to set up ChargePoint account and link this device with WiFi. The iOS app works great also.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C. Henley

customer_reviews.title: Very recommended to (VW/BMW/MB/FORD/NISSAN)
customer_reviews.text: One of the best charging stations vs the other brand I usually use them Also I connected to my Wi-Fi at home and monitor/control using the charge point app.
customer_reviews.author: Husam

customer_reviews.title: It failed
customer_reviews.text: I had to request a replacement. After 3 good charges, it mysteriously started popping the 50amp breaker in the subpanel in the garage. At least they didn't give me any flack, once they realized that there was no other explanation, it wasn't the car (Chevy Bolt), it wasn't the app, it wasn't the electrical supply (subpanel, breaker, outlet).
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Roberts

customer_reviews.title: EV car charger
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Using this for a Chevy Volt, charges up from empty to full somewhere just under 4 hours I believe. I like the phone app cause I can see if the car is actually charging or if it is just waiting for off peak rates.
customer_reviews.author: BK hitech

customer_reviews.title: Must have for EV
customer_reviews.text: This is a one of the best chargers I have seen and used. I'm on my second EV and this was a good purchase! The only complaint would be I wish it had a light on the plug to assist in plugging it in.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: After having a NEMA 6-50 outlet dropped just below my panels, installing the ChargePoint unit took about 15 minutes... 3 screws to mount to wall, snap-in wire connectors and plug in!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Charge point anticipates your EV needs
customer_reviews.text: Good recharging tool w/ Wi-Fi control. It arrived w/ helpful detailed installation instructions that didn't miss a trick.
customer_reviews.author: rc

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install just plug and go with a pre existing outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Im uncertain about ease of installation. We hired an electrician. It has worked perfectly so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo Dad

customer_reviews.title: Nice charger
customer_reviews.text: I like the charger used my local electrical rates and charged when it cheapest. Like phone integration and monitoring of charger activity.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install cool looking Level 2 charger
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Works like a charm and love the app and WiFi connectivity to schedule charging, track usage and approximate expense. We use ChargePoint at work too so it was a simple decision on which Level 2 charger to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bubba13

customer_reviews.title: Great home car charger
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Currently charges my car fast and makes me aware when done.
customer_reviews.author: dredvet

customer_reviews.title: Simple easy to use and intuitive
customer_reviews.text: Simply worked out of the box. There was a fault and called tech support. Outstanding service on phone. Turns out there was a problem with my wiring my electrician fixed it and then it just works. I use ChargePoint at work and with this home charger the app is now a one stop for all my charging needs.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous_2010

customer_reviews.title: He wants to be smarter than the car.
customer_reviews.text: He wants to be smarter than the car. Turn off before charging the car 100%.
customer_reviews.author: André Zanella

customer_reviews.title: Fast and compact charger
customer_reviews.text: Compact, fast, easy to use, Wi-fi enabled so i know the status of my charging and can set schedules if i desire.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: great unit
customer_reviews.text: Works great . Good instructions and I installed myself on 220 service. had a couple questions during activation and had great service from customer service
customer_reviews.author: William Shillinglaw

customer_reviews.title: Great charger.  Looks and works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. Looks and works perfect. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: Like how easy it is to use to charge my BOLT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son recommended this ChargePoint charger because he has it for his ...
customer_reviews.text: My son recommended this ChargePoint charger because he has it for his car. I like the way it looks, installation was easy. Love it and will recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: hnt

customer_reviews.title: Only 1/2 half was sent
customer_reviews.text: All I got was the cable for over $500. Something better be following up or the fit is gonna hit the shan.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: This is the right tool for the job. Really clean looking and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: We had a professional electrician install the charger and it now works wonderfully with my plug in hybrid car.
customer_reviews.author: Biff

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: Using with a Prius Prime. You have to have good WiFi coverage closeby to use it with their App and Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: E. Celis

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. WiFi integration and app make it extremely easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Monica L Kaufmann

customer_reviews.title: It's OK I guess
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to install, and it works. But you have to give them CC or Paypal info to set up a Chargepoint account in order to access the app features like scheduling and reminders. That's dumb. I don't intend to use any other Chargepoint other than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this EV Charger. Just a great product. So glad we went with this one. It is definitely more expensive than most. It's also very aesthetic and cleaning looking. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ella N.

customer_reviews.title: Hire a GOOD electrician to install
customer_reviews.text: Be mindful where you install it and rely on a very experienced electrician to do this job.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Product is designed well and installation is very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur F. Kuller

customer_reviews.title: Small footprint and easy to use on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.text: Provides as much power as the vehicle can take and the cord is not as thick as other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. I should have gotten the longer one
customer_reviews.author: Reina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product and works well - good tie in to app
customer_reviews.author: George E. Kleine

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: The charger works great. Charges the car battery very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit - easy install
customer_reviews.text: Setup is as easy as if were an Apple product!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chiappetta

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Charger didn't work and Charge Point tech could not figure out the issue. Very dissapointing
customer_reviews.author: Keane Kitagawa

customer_reviews.title: Stylish look and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Ready to install. Amazing quality. Looks cool in the garage
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: handle doesnt fit all cars, had to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Tim Swartos

product_meta.title: ChargePoint Home WiFi Enabled Electric Vehicle (EV) Charger - Level 2 240V, 32A Electric Car Charger for All EVs, UL Listed, ENERGY STAR Certified, Plug-in, 25 Ft Cable
product_meta.description: Style:Plug-in Station; 25 Ft CableChargePoint Home, a WiFi enabled, Level 2 electric car charger, charges any EV up to 6X faster than a standard outlet. Drivers can use the app to schedule charging at off-peak times to save money.
feature_bullets: Level 2, 240 volt, 32 amp electric vehicle (EV) charging station charges up to 6X faster than a standard wall outlet and adds up to 25 miles of range per hour, so you always have the range you need

Works with all EVs, including BMW i3, X5, and 530e, Chevy Volt and Bolt EV, Chrysler Pacifica Hybrid, Fiat 500e, Ford Fusion and C-Max Energi, Honda Clarity, Hyundai Kona, Jaguar I-PACE, Nissan LEAF, Tesla Model S and X, Toyota Prius Prime, and more

Use the ChargePoint app to schedule charging when electricity rates are low to save money, get access to ChargePoint’s expansive public charging network, track all of your charging in one place and set reminders so you never forget to plug in

UL listed charging station is built for electrical safety, backed by our 3-year warranty, covered by 24/7 driver support, and is the first ENERGY STAR certified EV charger (using 40% less energy, on average, than other car chargers when not in use)

Plug-in station (indoor installation only) uses a NEMA 6-50 outlet; Hardwired station can be installed indoors or outdoors and does not use a plug or an outlet; see below for installation guide and Amazon Home Services offers professional installation for your ChargePoint Home.

This selected plug-in station (indoor installation only) uses a NEMA 6-50 outlet. The hardwired station (not selected) can be installed indoors or outdoors and does not use a plug. Confirm with your installer which configuration to purchase, and see installation manual below. Amazon Home Services offers professional installation for your ChargePoint Home.

specifications.Cover Included: ChargePoint Home Charger and Charging Cable
